definitions.definition: The male erectile reproductive organ used for sexual intercourse that in the human male and other placental mammals is also used for urination ; the tubular portion of the external male genitalia (excluding the scrotum ).
A similar erectile sexual organ present in the cloacas of male amniotes .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The male erectile reproductive organ used for sexual intercourse that in the human male and other placental mammals is also used for urination ; the tubular portion of the external male genitalia (excluding the scrotum ).
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) A similar erectile sexual organ present in the cloacas of male amniotes .
